text: Bob Ash (born September 29, 1943) is a Canadian retired professional ice hockey defenceman. During his career he played 200 games in the World Hockey Association with the Winnipeg Jets and Indianapolis Racers. ==Awards and achievements== *MJHL First All-Star Team (1964) *Turnbull Cup MJHL Championship (1962, 1963, & 1964) ==Other websites== * Category:1943 births Category:Brandon Wheat Kings players Category:Buffalo Bisons (AHL) players Category:Canadian ice hockey defencemen Category:Ice hockey people from Manitoba Category:Living people Category:Providence Reds players Category:World Hockey Association players Category:Central Professional Hockey League players
title: Bob Ash
